snippet: A survey of officers and employees of large companies in 36 countries in Europe, the Middle East, Africa and India found that a fifth of them were aware of financial chicanery at their own company.
lead_paragraph: A survey of officers and employees of large companies in 36 countries in Europe, the Middle East, Africa and India found that a fifth of them were aware of financial chicanery at their own company.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: Cooking the Books
